name: Jerome MOUZON, Petitioner v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Mouzon v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Jerome MOUZON, Petitioner v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of February, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
39 A.3d 991
Jerome MOUZON, Petitioner v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 132 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 29, 2012.
